revision.comment: /* top */clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix
revision.text:
{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Linksys EA6900.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC1900 Wireless Smart Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=135971 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Linksys_EA6900_v1.1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = Supported |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Linksys |model = EA6900 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1900 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = Q87-EA6900V11 |icid = 3839A-EA6900V11 |us_id = <!-- US ID --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4708A0; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S34ML01G100TFI00; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = 1600 |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TQ2G63DFR-PBC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- Support automdix --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Support Jumbo frames --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;SiGe, 2623L, 246DH;3; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE5003L1;5003L1, 250KJ, 1250 MY;3; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Wistron NeWeb |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = FreshTomato-ARM,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 02/24/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 745883598588 |ean = 4260184663163 |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B00EXK14S0 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1336 P20, 315730 3 W; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1300 |nqam1 = 600 |rad1n = 450 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4360;BCM4360KMLG, TE1336 P20, 315730 3 W; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 600 |rad2n = 450 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 or 5 |rad2correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad2cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The FCC sample label indicates this model will continue to be manufactured by '''WNC'''.
{{WiFiCert|WFA52922|02/19/2014}} :Certification seems to indiciate this version will also be ''Broadcom'' based, the Wi-Fi driver version meshes with the usage of ''wl''
*[http://www.linksys.com/us/support-article?articleNum=138794 Product comparison between Linksys EA6200, EA6300, EA6350, EA6400, EA6700, and EA6900]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing Tomato=== {{ombox | type = speedy | style = width: 42%; | text = '''WARNING:''' <small>CFE 32KB NVRAM Bug.</small> }}
*[https://www.linksysinfo.org/index.php?threads/guide-flash-linksys-ea6300v1-ea6400-ea6500v2-ea6700-ea6900v1-0-1-1-with-tomato.73877/ Please read the following thread before flashing]
==Upgrading== ===Upgrading Tomato from Tomato=== ???
==Reverting== ===Reverting Tomato back to stock firmware=== ???
==Notes== ===Possibly used PSUs=== *The power supplies noted in the FCC test report are the :''Ktec'' KSAS0451200350HU and a :''Leader Electronics'' MU42-1120350-A1.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Ktec |model = KSAS0451200350HU |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.2 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = Leader Electronics |model = MU42-1120350-A1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.5 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 }}
{{hasPowerSupply |brand = I.T.E. |model = MU42-1120350-A1 |input_v=100-240 |input_a=1.5 |input_hz=50/60 |input_c=AC |input_conn=NEMA 1-15P |output_v=12 |output_a=3.5 |output_c=DC |output_conn=barrel |style=large, vertical |e_level=5 }}
